name: Minesweeper but with Golf!
description:
What Is the Game?

Minesweeper but with Golf! Is exactly what it says on the tin! Let's combine Minesweeper and through in some fun and chaotic golf, because who don't love Minesweeper and who doesn't love golf!

Favourite Feature?

The game features a seeded map generation so that way you can share golf courses with your friends and see who can do better!

What is it for?

This is my entry for the Search for a Star 2022 Programming Jam - And it was a lot of fun! It started off relatively slow for me due to final year obligations but being able to get this project as far as I have has been great, And I learned a lot! (Custom Editor tools are amazing)

Controls?

Mouse and keyboard are what you will be using to play!

  • Click buttons and Cubes with the Mouse
  • Middle Mouse Button on Cubes to Flag them
  • Click and Hold, and Drag the Mouse on the ball to shoot!
  • Left and Right or AD with Keyboard to pan around the ball!
Limitations?
  • When playing at the largest grid size you may have long load times depending on your PC
  • Some players may find Minesweeper hard...and that's fine! It is hard. If you want a tip, I will include it down below!
Recommendations?
  • Share your seeds, grid sizes and mine amounts with friends so that you can play the same maps!
Credits
  • The Grads in Game team need credits, one for holding the jam and two for providing us with the base code and setup for the game! - Thanks
  • The creators of golf and minesweeper
Secret Tip! Need Some Help?  - Click Me! The Cubes next to the ball start and hole will ALWAYS be safe!
